title: Coriander Raita
directions: Add grated cucumber and onion to a sieve, sprinkle with salt and let drain in fridge for up to 2 hours
Add yogurt, lime juice, drained cucumber and onion and Thai chili if using in a medium bowl and stir to combine
ingredients: 1/2 cup loosely packed fresh coriander leaves
1 tiny red or green Thai chli pepper (optional)
